career_summary: With over 10 years of experience in the IT industry, specializing in **QA Engineering** and **Software Development Engineering in Testing (SDET)**, I bring extensive expertise in **test automation frameworks**, **test planning**, and **cross-functional collaboration**.

I currently serve as **Lead SDET/Technical Test Lead** at **SunTrust**, overseeing multiple projects and teams. My role involves designing and implementing comprehensive **UI/Mobile/API automation frameworks** using **Selenium**, **Rest Assured**, **Appium**, and **BDD frameworks** like **Cucumber**, with a strong focus on ensuring seamless **system integrations** and **workflow validation** within **Salesforce** and **nCino** environments. I excel in developing **test strategies** for **cloud-based environments**, utilizing **Docker** and **Kubernetes** for **containerized testing**.

I bring extensive expertise in **HL7 FHIR standards**, **test automation**, and **healthcare compliance**. Currently serving as **Technical Test Lead**, I have deep experience in **healthcare software testing**, including **HIPAA compliance**, **HL7 protocols**, and **EDI integrations**. My background includes developing comprehensive **test automation frameworks** for **FHIR APIs**, implementing **performance testing** using **JMeter**, and managing **AWS cloud** testing environments. I excel in creating detailed **test plans**, building **automated test tools**, and ensuring thorough **documentation** for healthcare applications.

I have successfully architected and maintained **CI/CD pipelines** integrated with **Jira**, **QTest**, and **Jenkins**, ensuring seamless automated testing during deployments. My proficiency extends to **API testing** and **Rest Assured** framework development, where I perform detailed tests on loan origination systems and ensure smooth functionality of both **Salesforce** and **nCino** solutions. I manage testing environments in **AWS**, utilizing **EC2**, **RDS**, and other cloud services for comprehensive testing scenarios. As a technical leader, I excel in **mentoring team members**, providing thorough **code reviews**, and fostering an **automation-first culture**. I regularly collaborate with **developers**, **QA analysts**, and **DevOps teams** to ensure optimal test coverage and alignment with project goals. My role includes researching and evaluating **new testing tools** and **technologies** to enhance automation coverage and efficiency.

I provide regular updates on **testing progress**, **risks**, and **mitigation plans** to stakeholders, ensuring transparent communication and project success. My strong **analytical**, **problem-solving**, and **interpersonal** skills enable me to deliver high-quality solutions while maintaining strong relationships with cross-functional teams.

professional_summary.overview: Actively seeking a position as a **Software Test Lead** / **Software Development Engineer in Testing (SDET)**, allowing me to use my skills and to lend my expertise to the success of an organization.
highlights: Extensive experience in designing, developing, and implementing **test automation frameworks** for **UI**, **Mobile**, **API**, and **Database** testing, encompassing **functional**, **regression**, and **integration** testing.

Expert in leading teams to complete projects using both **Manual** and **Automation Testing**, with proven success in building and maintaining test cases using **BDD framework** with **Java/Python/TypeScript** and tools like **Cucumber**.

Strong proficiency in collaborating with **developers**, **QA analysts**, and **DevOps** teams to integrate and maintain **automated tests** into **CI/CD pipelines** using tools like **Jenkins**, ensuring seamless testing during deployments.
Extensive experience in **HL7 FHIR standard** implementation and testing, ensuring compliance with healthcare industry standards.
Expert in designing and executing **FHIR API** test strategies and automation frameworks using Python and modern testing tools.
Strong proficiency in developing automated test harnesses and tools for healthcare applications using **Python** and **AWS services**.
Extensive knowledge in **healthcare data standards** including **HL7, HIPAA, and EDI** implementations.
Proven expertise in performance testing using **JMeter** for healthcare applications and APIs.
Demonstrated success in creating comprehensive **test plans** and **documentation** for complex healthcare systems.
Strong experience with AWS cloud technologies for healthcare application testing and deployment.
Expert in **healthcare compliance testing** and validation of medical record systems.
Proficient in implementing test automation frameworks for healthcare APIs and web services.
Strong background in **healthcare claims processing** and **provider systems** testing.

Proven experience in developing **test strategies** for **cloud-based environments**, utilizing **Docker** and **Kubernetes** for **containerized testing**, while managing **AWS** test environments with **EC2**, **RDS**, and **CodePipeline**.

Demonstrated success in analyzing **system requirements** and designing efficient **test plans** and **test scripts** for optimal coverage across various testing types including **Unit**, **Integration**, **System**, and **Load Testing**.

Excellence in acting as a liaison between **core test automation framework** development team, **functional testing** team, and **delivery teams** to identify test requirements and ensure alignment with project goals.
Expertise in mentoring team members, providing thorough **code reviews**, and fostering an **automation-first culture** within the team while maintaining high standards of quality.
Solid knowledge of **Relational Databases**, **Data Modeling**, and **Analytics** skills, with extensive experience in **SQL Script** writing, testing, and debugging.
Proficient in working under different software development methodologies such as **Agile (SCRUM)**, **RUP**, and **V&V**, ensuring adaptability to various project requirements.
Strong track record in providing regular updates on **testing progress**, **risks**, and **mitigation plans** to stakeholders, maintaining transparent communication throughout the project lifecycle.
Extensive experience in implementing and maintaining **test automation frameworks** using **Gradle/Maven** platforms, ensuring robust and scalable testing solutions.
Proven expertise in developing **custom testing tools** and **utilities** to support automation efforts and improve team productivity.
Strong proficiency in **mobile testing automation** using **Appium**, covering both **iOS** and **Android** platforms for comprehensive mobile application testing.
Demonstrated success in implementing **parallel test execution** strategies to optimize test runtime and resource utilization.
Proficient in **version control systems** like **Git**, managing code repositories, and maintaining branching strategies for test automation code.
Strong experience in implementing **security testing** protocols, including **Authorization Testing**, **Access Control Testing**, and **Encryption/Decryption** validation.
Expertise in **cross-browser testing** automation, ensuring application compatibility across different browsers and versions.
Demonstrated success in implementing **automated reporting mechanisms** using tools like **Extent Reports** and **Allure**, providing detailed test execution insights to stakeholders.
Proficient in **API contract testing** using tools like **Pact** and **Swagger**, ensuring reliable integration between services.
Strong experience in implementing **test data management strategies, including data creation, cleanup, and maintenance for automated tests.**
Skilled at managing multiple concurrent employment responsibilities while maintaining exceptional performance across projects.
Proficient in remote work environments with demonstrated ability to balance multiple roles effectively.
